body_html:
The current atrous_conv2d seems having some shape issue, I got the following error:.

InvalidArgumentError: Image height 232 and width 248should be divisible by block_size: 16
     [[Node: atrous_conv2d_7/SpaceToBatch = SpaceToBatch[T=DT_FLOAT, block_size=16, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0"](transpose_21, atrous_conv2d_7/concat)]]
Caused by op u'atrous_conv2d_7/SpaceToBatch', defined at:

-----------Update-------------------

I fond changing the space_to_batch_pad from

v = array_ops.expand_dims(array_ops.pack([pad_top, pad_bottom]),1)
h = array_ops.expand_dims(array_ops.pack([pad_left, pad_right]),1)   
space_to_batch_pad = array_ops.concat(1, [v,h])

back to

space_to_batch_pad = [[pad_top, pad_bottom],
                          [pad_left, pad_right]]

helps

body:
The current atrous_conv2d seems having some shape issue, I got the following error:.

```
InvalidArgumentError: Image height 232 and width 248should be divisible by block_size: 16
     [[Node: atrous_conv2d_7/SpaceToBatch = SpaceToBatch[T=DT_FLOAT, block_size=16, _device="/job:localhost/replica:0/task:0/cpu:0"](transpose_21, atrous_conv2d_7/concat)]]
Caused by op u'atrous_conv2d_7/SpaceToBatch', defined at:
```

-----------Update-------------------

I fond changing the space_to_batch_pad from

```
v = array_ops.expand_dims(array_ops.pack([pad_top, pad_bottom]),1)
h = array_ops.expand_dims(array_ops.pack([pad_left, pad_right]),1)   
space_to_batch_pad = array_ops.concat(1, [v,h])
```

back to 

```
space_to_batch_pad = [[pad_top, pad_bottom],
                          [pad_left, pad_right]]
```

helps
